Parameters: Cell type and species (human airway epithelial cells, rodent tracheal epithelial cells, primary cells); culture conditions; passage number; days at ALI; patient demographics and clinical characteristics; disease diagnosis; sample type (sputum, BALF, tissue biopsies); cell line or primary cells; donor characteristics; culture model (ALI conditions); wounding method for repair assays; environmental conditions

EGF or TGF-α stimulation (concentration, duration); EGFR inhibitors (type and concentration); oxidative stressors (H₂O₂, diesel exhaust particles, cigarette smoke extract); environmental exposures; antioxidant pre-treatment; inflammatory cytokines; EGFR ligand type and concentration; ROS probes (DCFDA); stimulation conditions

EGFR phosphorylation levels (pEGFR at Tyr1068, Tyr1173 - fold change); Mucin gene expression (MUC5AC, MUC5B mRNA levels); Mucin protein levels; Goblet cell counts and percentage; Inflammatory cytokine levels (IL-8, IL-6, TNF-α); Downstream kinase activation (pERK, pAKT); ROS levels (fluorescence intensity); Soluble EGFR ligand levels (sEGF, sTGF-α); EGFR ligand expression (EGF, TGF-α, AREG); Time to peak activation; Wound closure rate (%/hour); Cell migration velocity; Proliferation markers (BrdU, Ki67); Pathway biomarker signatures
